name: Quickshot (itch) (antaxiom, Mugguy88)
description:
This is quickshot a fast paced top down shooter to play with your friends

All you need a is a keyboard, mouse and controller. 

The controls are as follow:

Keyboard:

Up: W

Down: S

Left: A

Right: D

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Dash: Space bar or Right Mouse Button

Aiming: Mouse

Controller:

Up: Dpad up or Analogue stick up

Down: Dpad down or Analogue stick down

Left: Dpad left or Analogue stick left

Right: Dpad- ight or Analogue stick right

Shoot:  Right trigger or Xbox A / Nintendo B button

Dash: Left trigger or Xbox B / Nintendo A button

Aiming: Right Stick

[Warning]: Although this game runs in the web browser controllers through web browsers can be dodgy and depend on the os and browser you use. Mappings may be set wrong or oddly. If possible use the offline version of the game to circumvent these issues.

Thanks for checking out my game, it's my first real "finished" game and first game jam submission. I understand it may not be great, but I'm just happy I got it done.

I'd also really like to thank my friend "Mugguy" for helping me out with all the art in this project!

Please report any bugs or feedback in the comments.
